description: Contributing to an ed-tech platform built using Next.js and Strapi CMS, implementing static generation and fetching structured content at build time for performance and SEO optimization.

impact: Improved scalability and reduced infrastructure overhead, enhanced performance and SEO optimization

description: Architected a modular, multi-brand dashboard for clients like Tanishq, Spinny, Bluestone, and Livspace, supporting real-time data pipelines.

description: Led full-stack development of Lion Charge, a web + admin platform for EV charging, including customer-facing QR-based charging flows and internal management tools.

Developed a Progressive Web App (PWA) for faster load times, offline access, and mobile-first usability
